info.author: Mario Ruggier
info.description:
QuickWikiEvoque - Pylons_ 0.9.7, Evoque_ 0.4, SQLALchemy_ 0.5.2 Tutorial Application

An updated version of the original QuickWiki tutorial application, 
to work with Pylons 0.9.7 (instead of 0.9.6), 
Evoque (instead of Mako) and 
SQLAlchemy 0.5 (instead of 0.4). 

Please follow the original explanatory text at 
http://wiki.pylonshq.com/display/pylonsdocs/QuickWiki+Tutorial for step by
step explanations,
with the obvious replacements for the different versions as indicated above, and
for the actual code just look at the source code in the distribution.

    .. _Pylons: http://www.pylonshq.com/
    .. _Evoque: http://evoque.gizmojo.org/
    .. _SQLAlchemy: http://www.sqlalchemy.org/
info.name: QuickWikiEvoque
info.summary: QuickWikiEvoque - Pylons 0.9.7, Evoque 0.4, SQLAlchemy 0.5.2 Tutorial Application

QuickWikiEvoque - Pylons 0.9.7, Evoque 0.4, SQLALchemy 0.5.2 Tutorial Application

An updated version of the original QuickWiki tutorial application, to work with Pylons 0.9.7 (instead of 0.9.6), Evoque (instead of Mako) and SQLAlchemy 0.5 (instead of 0.4).

Please follow the original explanatory text at http://wiki.pylonshq.com/display/pylonsdocs/QuickWiki+Tutorial for step by step explanations, with the obvious replacements for the different versions as indicated above, and for the actual code just look at the source code in the distribution.
